import React from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import ArticleList from '../components/ArticleList' import LinkMe from '../components/LinkMe' import Recommand from '../components/Recommand' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col, BackTop } from 'antd'; const Home = ({counter}) => (
博人堂--首页
) export default connect( function mapStateToProps(state){ return { counter: state.counter.count, username: state.user.username } } )(Home)
